comment: Define the algebra of n x n scalar matrices over a set (usually a ring) r, see definition in [Connell] p. 57: "A _scalar matrix_ is a diagonal matrix for which all the diagonal terms are equal, i.e., a matrix of the form cI_n". (Contributed by AV, 8-Dec-2019.)
